text: Roy Binilang Bawatanusa Janis (22 August 1957 â€“ 28 December 2020) was an Indonesian politician. From 1992 to 1997, he was a member of the People's Consultative Assembly. From 1999 to 2005, Janis was a member of the People's Representative Council. In 2005, he became the first chairman of the Democratic Renewal Party. He was born in Jakarta, Indonesia. Janis died at a Jakarta hospital on 28 December 2020, aged 63. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Indonesian politicians
title: Roy B. B. Janis
